name: Narwhal on a Unicycle
description:
Narwhal on a Unicycle is a short, but very difficult physics-based platformer. The game was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2019. The theme was: Only one...

... sorry.

Just like with Triwar, the graphics in Narwhal on a Unicycle were entirely generated using Javascript, which also means the resolution is fully dynamic.

The music and some sound effects were once again from freesound.org:
https://freesound.org/people/HoBoTrails/sounds/424927/
https://freesound.org/people/Mativve/sounds/416778/

The rest of the effects were created using as3sfxr
